about_the_game:
Thought you had enough awesome Pirates, Ninjas and Zombies? Well get a load of this bucko: Killer Plants, Steampunks, Ghosts and Bear Cavalry are here to smash into your game! This expansion features 4 all-new factions that you can mix and match to defeat your opponents.

By purchasing Awesome Level 9000, you’ll add the following 4 factions to Smash Up:

  • Bear Cavalry
  • Ghosts
  • Killer Plants
  • Steampunks

What factions will you be smashing together?



Feed them, Seymour! (Don’t do it Seymour!) Because these guys grow all on their own. They become stronger the longer they remain in play, so plants can be a major problem for anyone who came to the table without garden shears.


The Tsar wasn’t satisfied with mere horses. So you’re pretty much screwed. You can run away from them. Or you can get killed. Sometimes you get both. Just count yourself lucky that the bears aren’t also riding sharks.



In that darkest night at the old mansion an eerie light shone through the attic windows... even though no one was home. Ethereal ghosts gain power by having less of the tangible world. The faster you empty your hand, the stronger these spooks become!


Jules Verne once said, “Hey, Steampunks. Nice threads.” Ever since that fateful day, these retronauts have been classing up the joint everywhere they go. Any base in the game will look smarter and be just a bit friendlier for full-on Steampunk domination.
detailed_description:
Thought you had enough awesome Pirates, Ninjas and Zombies? Well get a load of this bucko: Killer Plants, Steampunks, Ghosts and Bear Cavalry are here to smash into your game! This expansion features 4 all-new factions that you can mix and match to defeat your opponents.

By purchasing Awesome Level 9000, you’ll add the following 4 factions to Smash Up:

  • Bear Cavalry
  • Ghosts
  • Killer Plants
  • Steampunks

What factions will you be smashing together?



Feed them, Seymour! (Don’t do it Seymour!) Because these guys grow all on their own. They become stronger the longer they remain in play, so plants can be a major problem for anyone who came to the table without garden shears.


The Tsar wasn’t satisfied with mere horses. So you’re pretty much screwed. You can run away from them. Or you can get killed. Sometimes you get both. Just count yourself lucky that the bears aren’t also riding sharks.



In that darkest night at the old mansion an eerie light shone through the attic windows... even though no one was home. Ethereal ghosts gain power by having less of the tangible world. The faster you empty your hand, the stronger these spooks become!


Jules Verne once said, “Hey, Steampunks. Nice threads.” Ever since that fateful day, these retronauts have been classing up the joint everywhere they go. Any base in the game will look smarter and be just a bit friendlier for full-on Steampunk domination.

name: Smash Up - Awesome Level 9000

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT or AMD Radeon HD 4600
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0C Compatible

short_description: Add four new totally awesome factions to your Smash Up collection with murderous Killer Plants, mighty Bear Cavalry, spooky Ghosts and inventive Steampunks!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support
